FuncDef: This command re-applies the managed SAP policy to the managed SAP identified by the specifiedsap-idor to all managed SAPs associated with the specifiedmsap-policy name.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an existing MSAP policy. The MSAP policy is re-applied to all associated managed SAPs.
Specifies an MSAP SAP ID. The MSAP policy is re-applied to the specified MSAP. Values-[port-id | lag-id]:qtag1.
